keyword: how many calories are in tootsie pops
title: How Many Calories Are in Tootsie Pops?
meta_description: Discover how many calories are in Tootsie Pops, including carbs, sugars, full nutrition breakdown per pop, and simple tweaks for variations.
h1: How Many Calories Are in Tootsie Pops?
assumptions: Standard Tootsie Pop (cherry or assorted flavor, ~17 g each), including hard candy shell and chewy Tootsie Roll center; no wrapper.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by flavor, batch, and manufacturer; exact values may differ. Check packaging for precise info.

quick_answer.text: One standard Tootsie Pop contains about 60 calories, mostly from sugars.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Remove the Tootsie Roll center (eat candy only)
Eat the Tootsie Roll center only

faqs.q: How many calories are in one Tootsie Pop?
faqs.a: Approximately 60 calories per standard Tootsie Pop.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in Tootsie Pops?
faqs.a: About 15 g of carbs per pop, with 11 g from sugars and 0 g fiber.

faqs.q: Do Tootsie Pops have any protein or fat?
faqs.a: Negligible amounts: 0 g protein and 0 g fat per pop.

faqs.q: How many calories in a pack of Tootsie Pops?
faqs.a: Varies by pack size; a single pop is 60 kcal, so multiply accordingly (e.g., 5-pack = 300 kcal).

faqs.q: Are there low-calorie versions of Tootsie Pops?
faqs.a: Standard versions are 60 kcal; sugar-free options, if available, may be lower at around 10-20 kcal per pop.
